dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 6638 IH: Guam Service Academy Equality Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Moylan introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend title 10, United States Code, adjust the number of cadets to be nominated to the United States Military Academy, United States Naval Academy, and United States Airforce Academy and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act shall be cited as the Guam Service Academy Equality Act.

section.header: Nominations to United States military academy
section.text: Section 7442. (a) of title 10 United States Code is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (8) by striking Four cadets from Guam, nominated by the Delegate in Congress from Guam. and inserting Five cadets from Guam, nominated by the Delegate in Congress from Guam.

section.header: Nominations to United States naval academy
section.text: Section 8454. (a) of title 10 United States Code is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (8) by striking Four cadets from Guam, nominated by the Delegate in Congress from Guam. and inserting Five cadets from Guam, nominated by the Delegate in Congress from Guam.

section.header: Nominations to United States airforce academy
section.text: Section 9442. (a) of title 10 United States Code is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (8) by striking Four cadets from Guam, nominated by the Delegate in Congress from Guam. and inserting and inserting Five cadets from Guam, nominated by the Delegate in Congress from Guam.
